Text: Also have Mutiny Within (Self Titled) in 320, if interested I can post as well.

It is a matter of recorded fact that illegal downloads were responsible for the disappointing sales of their first album, which led to MW being dropped from﻿ Roadrunner, and ultimately their breakup. When this album comes out, we all must BUY it. We must give this album all of the attention that the first didn't get, and more. As said below, I hope this the release of this album reunites MW. They deserve it.

So if you like it, buy it.
